summary: Tested A/B Testing notification emails feature and JWT session timeout (480 minutes). All 7 backend tests passed (100%). Frontend UI verified - notification emails input field appears correctly when Smart Winner is enabled.
critical_code_review_comments: notification_emails field correctly implemented in frontend (page.tsx lines 69-88, 115-135, 585-628)
Backend API /api/admin/experiments/create correctly accepts notification_emails as array (server.py line 6448)
JWT_ACCESS_TOKEN_EXPIRE_MINUTES correctly set to 480 (8 hours) in backend/.env
data-testid='notification-emails-input' attribute properly added for testability
Helper text 'Comma-separated list of email addresses to notify when a winner is found' displayed correctly
Email parsing logic correctly converts comma-separated string to array before API submission
seed_data_creation: Test experiments created during API testing with prefix TEST_ (automatically cleaned up)
context_for_next_testing_agent: A/B Testing notification emails feature fully tested. Backend tests verify: 1) JWT expires_in is 28800 seconds (480 min), 2) JWT token exp claim is ~480 min, 3) notification_emails stored as array in smart_winner config, 4) Empty and missing notification_emails handled correctly, 5) .env has JWT_ACCESS_TOKEN_EXPIRE_MINUTES=480

jwt_session_timeout_480_minutes.details: Login returns expires_in=28800 (480 minutes x 60 seconds), JWT token exp claim verified at ~480 minutes

notification_emails_frontend_ui.details: Notification Emails input field appears when Smart Winner is enabled, with placeholder 'admin@example.com, manager@example.com' and helper text

notification_emails_api.details: POST /api/admin/experiments/create accepts notification_emails as array, stored in smart_winner.notification_emails

smart_winner_configuration.details: Smart Winner section shows: enabled toggle, strategy dropdown (Notify Only/Auto-Rollout/Gradual), min_runtime_hours input, notification_emails input
